name: SCOUT Marketing
description:
SCOUT is a full-service ad agency with offices in Atlanta, Chicago and San Diego. SCOUT's mantra is "Be Brave." We work across various brand categories to deliver brave thinking that creates value for our clients' brands. We also encourage employees to bring bravery to work, and their lives. 
A culture of open-minded support is at our heart. It’s how we hire, it’s how we promote, and it’s what we teach.nd Mobile Apps. Previous clients include Smirnoff and Fox Theatre.
